TopicTitle: Convert docking ports assembled together in SPH or VAB editor to "docked" when craft is enters Prelaunch status on the launch pad or runway

Articles.Content: This is probably not a huge programming problem but a fairly big game play problem.   Currently about 1 in 5 times I have to have KIS installed and an engineer on board to EVA detach the ports because they won't decouple or undock the first time properly.  But after the EVA detachment they function fine for all future dockings/undockings.  By putting into "docked" status upon going to the runway or launch pad and erasing any trace of them being "attached" like any other part my gut tells me a lot of stuck docking port woes that people encounter will magically evaporate.  Couldn't hurt to try, right?
